title: New: mono mono – rumours
body:
There’s a real discerning honesty to Danish duo **mono mono** and their twisted pop music.

Whilst centred around radio ready pop hooks, they manage to remain delightfully uncompromising in their quest to be strikingly unique. Latest track, _rumours_, their third offering thus far, is sleek and effortless, that ends up feeling as much inspired by The Knife or Portishead as it does Sylvan Esso or MØ. Check it out below.
